content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. However, I can tell you that the Commodores' influence on R&B and funk music is still relevant today. Their iconic sound has been sampled and used as inspiration by contemporary artists in a range of genres, from hip-hop and pop to R&B and soul. For example, R&B singer John Legend sampled the Commodores' hit "Easy" on his 2006 track "Save Room," while rapper Kendrick Lamar used snippets of their music on his album "To Pimp a Butterfly." The enduring popularity of the Commodores' music is a testament to their continued impact on the world of R&B and funk.
